Home / jumpsuits & overalls / Hand dyed bamboo jumpsuit

Hand dyed bamboo jumpsuit

£130.00

Sustainable bamboo jumpsuit loungewear | Wide leg loose playsuit | Handmade silky overalls | Summer orange romper culottes | Wrap one piece

— OR —

Category: jumpsuits & overalls

Product Details

Our sleeveless bamboo jumpsuit is the perfect comfy and soft loungewear. It has a gorgeous thick tie, a wrap romper style and a wide-leg. I hand dye each one resulting in a soft marbling texture (almost tie dye but more classy). Because of it’s elegant fabric yet easy silhouette, it is also super versatile- you can wear it to the beach over your swimwear, wear it unbelted and loose, or belted and dressed up for work, an interview or a night out. You can layer it with shirts, jumpers, kimonos, cardigans and denim or (faux/vintage🌱🐄🌎) leather jackets. It’s also passed the test with both doc Martens and heels 💃💃. I crown it the chameleon of jumpsuits.

SUSTAINABLE:
I make this jumpsuit from 100% bamboo viscose. Bamboo is grown without fertilisers and pesticides (unlike non-organic cotton which is heavily sprayed). This bamboo viscose is made in a closed loop system and the yarn is Oeko-tex certified as being free from harmful substances.

The dye I use is the dye of choice for organic clothing manufacturers! It is metal-free, safe for the environment and is ideal for those with sensitive skin. The dyes do not bleed when the garment is wet and I take steps to minimise water use during the dyeing process.
I also only dye fabric to order, ensuring no wastage!

The labels we use are made from recycled fabric that is OEKO-TEX standard 100 certified. We also package the product in recycled paper.

WASH CARE:
Machine wash at 30 degrees C. Drip dry and iron on medium heat. Do not bleach. To waste less water, energy and to make your clothes last longer, wash on cold, wash less often and don’t tumble dry.io

Size & fit

SIZES: I am slowly adding different sizes as I am currently drafting them- so watch this space! If you are concerned about size and fit, please get in touch and I will be happy to accommodate changes to the design. The female model in the photo is a size 8, is 5ft 6” tall and is wearing the size 8.

Delivery & returns

If you need to return an item, please contact me within 14 days of delivery and ship items back within 30 days of delivery.

Items are made to order so preparation times and shipping times will vary. We aim to dispatch orders within 5 days and send orders 1st class.
